CustomBehavior.Text: Bot will do next quest alone, but will take long time, \n whit human assistance, just need like 1 minute\n Just copy/mimic the Tian instructor if you want help!!!
Bot will do next quest alone, but will take long time, \n whit human assistance, just need like 1 minute\n Just Attack the corrosponding Training Bag Left or Right!!!

PickUp.QuestName: The Temple of the Jade Serpent

TurnIn.QuestName: The Temple of the Jade Serpent

CustomBehavior.Text: Need human interaction for next quests, No Mesh for this room\n\n 1) Turn-in quest, accept other 2 quests 2) Use Infested Books and right click 12 Bookworms 3) Kill 8 Dapplet Moths. 4) Turn-in 2 quests accept the next one 5) Click Golden Serpent 6) Cross the room and exit from other side (need go up stairs) 7) When outside start bot again
